titleStmt.title: A treatise concerning a Christians carefull abstinence from all appearance of evill gathered for the most part out of the schoolemen, and casuists: wherein the questions and cases of conscience belonging unto the difficult matter of scandall are briefly resolved: By Henry Jeanes, Mr of Arts, lately of Hart-Hall in Oxon, and rector of the church of Beere-Crocombe in Somerset-shire.
titleStmt.author: Jeanes, Henry, 1611-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Turner for H. Curteine,

notesStmt.note: Page 142: page number printed upside down.
Running title reads: Abstinence from all appearance of evill in practice.
Errata on verso of G6, final leaf.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
